title: reinstalling league of legends everytime
body: so i dowloaded league of legends and started playing it and all was well and i waited about 1 hour until everything was dowloaded i got t grab something to eat and i come back and my computer is off i turn my computer back on and try starting up the game again and it started to do the downloading process meanwhile i already did PLEASE HELP!!

replies.body: Your pc most likely shut off for some reason while you were away, which interrupted the download process. If it gets interrupted you're going to need to wait for the full patch again, but let me know if it keeps giving you this repatch error.
